title: Imperialist
content: The creation of this typeface is inspired by the actions that government figures have taken in recent years and more importantly the last few months. The concept is not anti-American but makes note of the follies of our foreign policy. I think it is important, as an American to question the major decisions made in government so that the Americas voice, the people, doesn
author: adam_k

comments.content:
This is pretty interesting (an appropriate). Where FF Falafel is just cute, the intentional "discord" in the design makes it much more real.   
   
hhp

-here's another Faux Arabic   
   
Imperialist does not compromise the real characters of the arabic alphabet, such as above mentioned, but forms english letters by arranging true letters and combinations assimilated from the arabic alphebet.
